alert.note: Alert for Acadia; Allen; Evangeline; Jefferson Davis (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 30 at 10:15PM CST until February 03 at 3:00AM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Louisiana... Bayou Nezpique Near Basile Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING TO EARLY FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Bayou Nezpique Near Basile. * WHEN...From Tuesday morning to early Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At 22.0 feet, Minor agricultural flood damage will occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 PM CST Monday the stage was 21.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tomorrow morning to a crest of 22.5 feet Wednesday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Thursday afternoon. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 am CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Thu Fri Bayou Nezpique Basile 22.0 21.3 Mon 9 pm CST 22.4 22.3 21.8 &&
